title: Edge-based URL Shortener
description: Uses Edge Functions and PostgreSQL with hash indexing. Sharded database into 6 around the globe. DB queries are routed to first responding DB.

title: Nagwa: Full-Stack Task Managment App
description: Feature-rich task management application built with React, Express.js and TypeScript.

title: useEventer: React Hook for Adding Listeners Efficiently
description: Available as an npm package and a GitHub Gist.

title: YouCaption: Browser Extension
description: Browser Extension for better YouTube captions readability.

title: Build React Action
description: A GitHub Action to build React app on every push and publishes it to a branch and directory of user's choice.

title: Caching Proxy CLI
description: Modular, Ready to use, Read-through Caching Proxy CLI with LRU eviction policy.
